name: Remnant-the-Game
description: A 4-player browser-based stategy game as a mix of Risk and trading card games like Yu-Gi-Oh! Based off the fictional board game featured in the Rooster Teeth webseries RWBY.

dependencies._comment1: pg suggested to be upgraded from 6.0.3 to >6.0.5 due to high severity security vulnrability in 6.0.0
